content.text: Consider the following equations and select all the ordered pairs that consist of correct solutions (there are multiple correct answers)

hint.text: Let us consider the equation 5x + 3y = 19. Here, x = 2 and y = 3 is a solution because when you substitute x = 2 and y = 3 in the equation above, you find that 5x + 3y = (5 \(\times\) 2) + (3 \(\times\) 3) = 19. This solution is written as an ordered pair (2, 3).
